wikipedia_page.main: Bryan Deasley (born 29 June 1988) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays for Lochee United.

response: Bryan Deasley (born November 26, 1968) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey winger. He was a first round selection, 19th overall, by the Calgary Flames at the 1987 National Hockey League (NHL) Entry Draft.  He never reached the NHL and retired in 1993 after one season touring with the Canadian National Team and four in the minor leagues.  Deasley worked as a player agent for several years.
